{"step_by_step_thinking": "According to the documents, each finger is provided with two interossei (palmar or dorsal), with the exception of the little finger, in which the abductor digiti minimi muscle takes the place of one of the dorsal interossei. Therefore, the little finger does not have two dorsal interossei. The remaining fingers (ring, middle, and index) have two dorsal interossei. Therefore, the correct answer is B. Ring.", "answer_choice": "B"}
